metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel confronts a tiefling that has seen another githyanki. She tried to prise the information from him with intimidation, perhaps insisting he bow to show proper deference. Key emotions: Lae'zel is arrogant and fearsome; Zorru is afraid she will attack, but tries not to show it - at first.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Have Lae'zel in your party- Talk to Zorru in the grove (goto 201, 567)

25.speaker: Zorru
25.text: My f-friend's blood not enough? Come to rip me open, too?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches the sniveling tiefling. Camera should see her from slightly below so she seems to lord over him.

22.speaker: Lae'zel
22.text: In Crèche K'liir, a formal greeting begins with a bow.

15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling looks to the player.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Yes. And I suggest you do as she says.

5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling pauses, then bows slightly.

110.speaker: Player
110.text: Wait for the tiefling to obey.

100.speaker: Zorru
100.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

88.speaker: Zorru
88.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: No twisting? Kin must have been in a hurry.

55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.text: Up. You can keep your innards.

20.speaker: Wyll
20.text: By the dead gods, are all gith so brutal?

52.speaker: Lae'zel
52.text: Brutal? Blood still flows through his own veins. I was positively gentle.

19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling rises but is still fearful.

56.speaker: Astarion
56.text: You're not going to eviscerate him? I was hoping for a show.

83.speaker: Lae'zel
83.text: Cool your blood - I'll indulge you soon enough.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: She's serious. You'd better get on your knees. Fast.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: That's enough, Lae'zel. I'll take it from here.

74.speaker: Lae'zel
74.text: You dare interrupt? Has the tadpole ravaged your senses?

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.text: Has the tadpole ravaged your senses? It is his suffering that will lead us to purity.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Fine - do as you must. But keep it quick.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Enough, Lae'zel. You will be silent.

95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel scowls, then steps out of the way to let you interorgate the tiefling yourself.

18.speaker: Zorru
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player helps tiefling to his feet.

54.speaker: Zorru
54.text: What do you want from m-me?

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Information. Where did you see the githyanki?

90.speaker: Zorru
90.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

32.speaker: Zorru
32.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

27.speaker: Zorru
27.text: And I just... I just ran.

45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is mad at you.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: You can breathe again. I won't let her hurt you.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Tell me of this gith, or I will serrate your ears until I see one in you.

21.speaker: Zorru
21.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

30.speaker: Zorru
30.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

81.speaker: Zorru
81.text: And I just... I just ran.

79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: I'm sorry. She can be... harsh.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: Thanks for the information. You can get up.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling stands up and nods to you.

101.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling should now remain where he is in a kneeling position.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Quit snivelling. We're done with you.

6.speaker: Zorru
6.text: Just keep that th-thing away from me.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: All right, Lae'zel. You got what you needed.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

4.speaker: Lae'zel
4.text: Up. You can keep your innards.

104.speaker: Player
104.text: You - tell me where you saw the githyanki.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Hold it, Lae'zel. I'll see to this one.

62.speaker: Lae'zel
62.text: You dare interrupt? Has the tadpole ravaged your senses?

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Fine - do as you must. But make it quick.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Enough. Stand down - I won't tell you again.

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel scowls, then steps out of the way to let you interorgate the tiefling yourself.NodeContext: Idiot! (keh-CHOCK-ey)

35.speaker: Player
35.text: You can breathe again. I won't let her hurt you.

67.speaker: Zorru
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player helps tiefling to his feet.

1.speaker: Zorru
1.text: What do you want from m-me?

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Information. Where did you see the githyanki?

31.speaker: Zorru
31.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

113.speaker: Zorru
113.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

61.speaker: Zorru
61.text: And I just... I just ran.

8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is mad at you.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Tell me of this gith, or I will serrate your ears until I see one in you.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You - tell me where you saw the githyanki.

102.speaker: Zorru
102.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

106.speaker: Zorru
106.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

28.speaker: Zorru
28.text: And I just... I just ran.

38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Thanks for your help... and apologies for my companion.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Quit your snivelling. We're done with you.

53.speaker: Zorru
53.text: Just keep that th-thing away from me.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: All right, Lae'zel. You got what you needed.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Talk, tiefling. Where did you see another like her?

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I think we can resolve this with some decorum - don't you think?

85.speaker: Lae'zel
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel turns to you for her line, then turns back to the tiefling.NodeContext: Matter of fact.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Show some sympathy, Lae'zel. He's terrified.

24.speaker: Lae'zel
24.text: Has the tadpole ravaged your senses? Sympathy will not lead us to purity.
